org.apache.flex.compiler.tree.mxml

Interface IMXMLClassReferenceNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IASNode, IMXMLNode, ISourceLocation
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMXMLApplicationNode, IMXMLArrayNode, IMXMLBooleanNode, IMXMLClassDefinitionNode, IMXMLClassNode, IMXMLClearNode, IMXMLCompilerDirectiveNodeBase, IMXMLComponentNode, IMXMLConcatenatedDataBindingNode, IMXMLDataBindingNode, IMXMLDataBindingNodeContainer, IMXMLDeferredInstanceNode, IMXMLDesignLayerNode, IMXMLDocumentNode, IMXMLEmbedNode, IMXMLExpressionNode, IMXMLFactoryNode, IMXMLFunctionNode, IMXMLHTTPServiceNode, IMXMLInstanceNode, IMXMLIntNode, IMXMLModelNode, IMXMLNumberNode, IMXMLObjectNode, IMXMLRegExpNode, IMXMLRemoteObjectMethodNode, IMXMLRemoteObjectNode, IMXMLRepeaterNode, IMXMLResourceNode, IMXMLSingleDataBindingNode, IMXMLStateNode, IMXMLStringNode, IMXMLUintNode, IMXMLVectorNode, IMXMLWebServiceNode, IMXMLWebServiceOperationNode, IMXMLXMLListNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MXMLClassDefinitionNode, MXMLDocumentNode, MXMLRepeaterNode

    public interface IMXMLClassReferenceNode
extends IMXMLNode
    This AST node represents an MXML tag which maps to an ActionScript class, either as an instance of that class or a definition of a subclass of this class.

    An IMXMLClassReferenceNode has N child nodes; each is an IMXMLSpecifierNode specifying the value of a property, the value of a style, or ActionScript code to handle an event.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.flex.compiler.common.ISourceLocation

      • getPropertySpecifierNode

        IMXMLPropertySpecifierNode getPropertySpecifierNode(String name)
        Gets the child node specifying a particular property. It may have been specified in MXML either by an attribute or by a child tag.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property.
        Returns:
        An IMXMLPropertySpecifierNode specifying that property.

      • getPropertySpecifierNodes

        IMXMLPropertySpecifierNode[] getPropertySpecifierNodes()
        Gets all the child nodes that specify properties. These may have been specified in MXML either by attributes or by child tags.
        Returns:
        An array of IMXMLPropertySpecifierNode objects.

        IMXMLEventSpecifierNode getEventSpecifierNode(String name)

        Returns:
        An IMXMLEventSpecifierNode specifying that event.
